title: St. George's Parade & Service
description: Tewkesbury Scouts invites you to our St. George's Parade and Service at Tewkesbury Abbey.

title: Beavers & Cubs Activity Day
description: From paddling across the water to mastering bushcraft skills, there’s something for everyone to enjoy.

title: Scouts & Explorers Activity Day
description: From paddling across the water to mastering bushcraft skills, there’s something for everyone to enjoy.

title: Winchcombe Scouts Spring Fayre
description: Come and join 1st Winchcombe Scouts between 11am and 3pm at their Scout Hut on May Day for a day of fun, games, food and festivities.

title: Woodmancote May Day
description: Come and join 1st Woodmancote Scouts from 12:30pm until 4pm at the Woodmancote May Day Fete. Watch the Beavers parade and grab a bite to eat at our BBQ.

title: Annual General Meeting
description: Join Tewkesbury District Scout Council for our Annual General Meeting followed by a BBQ.
